channel.title: Bayesian Optimization on Haoran You
channel.description: Recent content in Bayesian Optimization on Haoran You

item.title: [IEEE TNNLS] Bayesian Cycle-Consistent Generative Adversarial Networks via Marginalizing Latent Sampling
item.description: Accepted as IEEE TNNLS regular paper! Abstract: Recent techniques built on generative adversarial networks (GANs), such as cycle-consistent GANs, are able to learn mappings among different domains built from unpaired data sets, through min-max optimization games between generators and discriminators.
